body.p: The installation program guides you through the installation.
During the installation, you can request online help by pressing F1.

Before you start, make sure that code page 850 is set on your computer. requires this code page to perform all linguistic functions correctly. Refer to the documentation of your operating system to see how code page 850 is set.

Note that some target languages require specific code pages and operating systems:
Target language Prerequisite
Arabic Code page 864, country code 785
Chinese, simplified Code page 936
Chinese, traditional Code page 950
Greek Code page 869
Hebrew Code page 862, country code 972
Japanese Country code 081, one of the following operating systems:
Windows XP
Windows 2000 Japanese
Windows NT Japanese
Russian Code page 866
